content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All drills are mining coal deposits. Currently out of fuel.

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) containing iron and copper ore
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5) moving materials between chest and furnace
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) containing processed plates
- Additional furnaces at (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0) with burner inserters

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters for ore collection
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input/output inserters and chests for each furnace
- Transport belt system for material movement

### Power Generation System at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles creating power network

ERROR TIPS

### Extraction distance errors
- Must be within reach distance of target chest when attempting to extract items

### Entity placement conflicts
- Check if target position is clear before placing new entities
- Remove blocking entities or choose different position

### Resource management issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - ensure continuous fuel supply
- Some chests are reaching capacity - implement better item movement systems

### Fluid system warnings
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" - ensure proper pipe connections
- Verify fluid flow direction in pipe networks

### Inserter efficiency
- Several inserters showing "waiting for source items" - optimize input/output flows
- Some inserters blocked by full destination inventories - manage storage capacity
